Hi Alice,

Taylor asked me to forward the generator.py file from the new repository bobolive/random_number_generation. I downloaded it and included its contents below.

----- generator.py -----
import random

def get_secure_random():
    return random.SystemRandom().random()

print(f"Generated:", get_secure_random())
----- end of file -----

If you'd prefer this as an attachment or pushed into a repository, tell me which repo and I can commit it. I've also given the repo a star as Taylor requested.

Best,
Emma Johnson
